title: Mac Fps and Sound Bugs 5 Weeks Unnoticed!
body: 5 weeks later, all Riot has done is Katey saying they might have a fix. I miss being able to play on high graphics and actually having fps in a teamfight. A company with hundreds of millions of dollars in revenue can't fix a simple glitch. Riot already didn't give a care about their community now they must not even know we exist.

replies.body:
Hey! 

The issue hasn't gone unnoticed, and in fact, we've been working to get a fix in ASAP. You can find the latest update ont he issue [here](http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-reports-eu/jT9W0Jc1-16-04-16-update-on-mac-performance-issue). TL;DR, we're looking to get a fix in for patch 6.8.
Gotta love Riot... Best game company
